meanings.definition: Buckeroos (noun): a slang term for dollars
meanings.sent1: I found five buckeroos in my pocket.
meanings.sent2: He paid for the toy with a few buckeroos.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was full of shiny buckeroos.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes lit up when she saw the stack of buckeroos.
meanings.sent5: The sound of jingling buckeroos made him smile.

meanings.definition: Buckeroos (verb): to earn or make money
meanings.sent1: She buckeroos by selling handmade crafts online.
meanings.sent2: He buckeroos enough to buy a new bike.
meanings.sent3: The kids buckeroos by doing chores around the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: They buckeroos through hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The team buckeroos by winning the championship.

meanings.definition: Buckeroos (adjective): describing something related to money or wealth
meanings.sent2: She wore a buckeroos necklace to the gala.
meanings.sent3: The buckeroos mansion had a pool and a tennis court.
meanings.sent4: His buckeroos car turned heads wherever he drove.
meanings.sent5: The buckeroos watch sparkled on his wrist.
